content: big bay beanie crochet pattern - instant download includes instructions for a crochet beanie hat pattern the hat is easy to work in simple stitches ***please note that this pattern is available for free on my blog www crochet365knittoo com the benefit of purchasing this pdf is an easy to read printable and ad-free version of the pattern *** materials needed - chunky weight yarn exact brand and color provided - crochet hook size j - tapestry needle for weaving in ends size for an average adult 20 around the beanie is 8 5 long pattern is written in english using standard american terms level beginner/advanced beginner this listing is for a pdf pattern instant download not a finished product please make sure to download adobe reader at www adobe com if you do not already have it on your computer copyright ©2018 crochet 365 knit too do not reproduce sell or copy this pattern in any way you may however sell finished products due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase
